summary: One day in the life of a small US town. Donnie, newly released from jail; Tommy the local cop separated from his wife; Rhett, preparing to leave to try his luck in Nashville. The story weaves these characters' stories.
cast: Shawn Christian|Chris Pine|Bre Blair|Kali Majors|John Hawkes|Lin Shaye|Adam Hendershott|Octavia Spencer|Brent Briscoe|Muse Watson|Bill McKenzie|Damara Reilly|Mike Lutgen|Scott Michael Campbell|Ryan Craig|Elina Madison|Martin Corcoran|Robert Pine|Joanne McGee|David Kronenberg|Lawrence Turner|Nina Corcoran|Gigi Bannister|Perry Anzilotti|R.A. Mihailoff|Rachel Winfree|Robert Catrini|Sophia Marzocchi|Jessica Lieberman|Allayna Pantzazin|Reggie Bannister|Susan Chalfant|Winnie Schilling|Annemarie Pazmino|Phil Vassar|Stephen Bertrand|John Campbell|Adam Culvey|Bill Barrett|Tim Fox|Seth Ayott|Hayley Seat|Scott St. Blaze|Vanessa Vander Pluym
keywords: bank robbery|ex convict|swearing in front of a child|overbearing mother|singer songwriter
title: Small Town Saturday Night
